name: Orange Ginger Mule
description: A classic mule is made with ginger beer, lime, and lots of ice. This is a healthier twist made with orange juice and iced tea. It is best made with fresh orange juice to maximize the bump in Vitamin C.
preparation:
1. Fill a large glass or copper mug (the typical cup used for mules) with ice. Pour in chilled tea, orange juice, and then club soda.
  2. Stir in vodka, if using. Garnish with toppings, if desired.
tips:
Swap in any fruit juice for orange juice! Try peach, pineapple, or cranberry juice.
